sentence.Network_en: All the Greenpeace people behaved with impressive forbearance and dignity.
sentence.Network_cn: 所有绿色和平组织人士表现出了超乎寻常的克制和大度。

sentence.Network_en: He acted with forbearance toward the hecklers.
sentence.Network_cn: 他对质问者表现出极大的克制.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词汇的奥秘 ... repentance 后悔 forbearance 克制，忍耐 endurance 持久，忍耐.
词根及词缀 ... perseverance n 坚持不懈 forbearance n 自制，忍耐 vigilance n 警惕.
宽容(Forbearance)2节: 指理解别人的弱点和缺点的态度。 2. 如果没有以上的品性就不可能实现合一。
-ancy 拉/法forbearance 节制-ence 拉/法

entry.def: If you say that someone has shown forbearance, you admire them for behaving in a calm and sensible way about something that they have a right to be very upset or angry about.

example.ex: All the Greenpeace people behaved with impressive forbearance and dignity.
example.tran: 所有绿色和平组织人士表现出了超乎寻常的克制和大度。

means.word_mean: 1. good-natured tolerance of delay or incompetence
2. a delay in enforcing rights or claims or privileges; refraining from acting;

auth_sentence.content: For instance, right now he's learning forbearance.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: For instance, right now he's learning forbearance.

auth_sentence.content: A look in which superiority mingled with forbearance.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 接受,承诺,容忍,赞同,相信
stems_affixes.word_buile: accept接受,承诺+ance物品,性质,状况→n.接受,承诺,容忍,赞同,相信
allow允许+ance物品,性质,状况→宽容→津贴,补助

stems_affixes.value_cn: 出现,露面;外表;[在会议等]作短暂露面
stems_affixes.word_buile: appear出现+ance物品,性质,状况→n.出现,露面;外表;[在会议等]作短暂露面
apply应用+ance物品,性质,状况→appliance用具,器具
assist援助,帮助+ance物品,性质,状况→n.协助,援助,补助
bal+ance物品,性质,状况→n.天平 n.&v.秤,平衡
disturb扰乱,防碍+ance物品,性质,状况→n.动乱,骚乱,干扰
forbear忍受+ance物品,性质,状况→n.自制,忍耐
guide指导+ance物品,性质,状况→n.指导,领导
ignore不理,不顾,忽视+ance物品,性质,状况→ignorance无知,愚昧
persevere坚持+ance物品,性质,状况→n.坚持

resemble[v.像,类似]+ance物品,性质,状况→n.相似,相似性[点,物]
venge惩罚+ance物品,性质,状况→n.报复,报仇,复仇
bal+ance物品,性质,状况→n.天平 n.&v.秤,平衡
allow允许+ance物品,性质,状况→宽容→津贴,补助

sentences.en: Pressed beyond the limits of forbearance,our army fought back resolutely and dealt telling blows to the enemy.
sentences.cn: 我军忍无可忍,奋起反击,给了敌人沉重的打击。
